meanings.sent1: The octahedral crystal sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry designer crafted an octahedral pendant.
meanings.sent3: The octahedral gemstone winked mischievously from its setting.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like an octahedral chime.
meanings.sent5: The octahedral shape of the snowflake was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A solid figure with eight faces.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the octahedral structure of the mineral.
meanings.sent2: The diamond was cut into an octahedral shape.
meanings.sent3: The octahedral dice rolled across the table, bringing luck to the player.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline resembled an octahedral silhouette against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The octahedral crystal glowed with an inner light.
